ygData.subject: Info on a guild website?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey there, Hi there, Ho there, fellow EQ addicts: I m looking for a website that I stumbled across in my travels -- I was there about 2 weeks ago and lost the
ygData.messageBody:
Hey there, Hi there, Ho there, fellow EQ addicts:

I'm looking for a website that I stumbled across in my travels -- I was
there about 2 weeks ago and lost the URL. (No, it's not in my history.)
It's a website for a dark elven guild that was really visually
appealing... the graphics were done similarly to those in Neriak (neon,
transparent, etc) on a black background.

Has anyone seen one like this? Any information would be greatly
appreciated.

-troy
(aka any number of other personas)
